item.title: How one U.S. conservationist's work is helping to preserve Chile's wilderness
item.description: Chile is set to gain its 47th national park early this year — largely due to the efforts of U.S. conservationist Kristine Tompkins and her organization.

item.title: People are rushing to install solar panels before Trump becomes President
item.description: Potential rooftop solar customers and installers worry the incoming Trump administration might try to eliminate a 30% federal tax credit. Some customers plan to install sooner because of that and solar companies are changing their business plans.

item.title: Jack Smith has resigned from the justice department, after submitting his Trump report
